page.title: 15A Survey of our Class.
page.content: The average number of people in a family in our class, is 3.9. This includes children, grandparents, parents, and other relatives. The most people had two adults and two children, then two adults and three children, then two adults and four children. People have an average of 2.17 pets per family, they come in this order of favouritism: 1st - rabbits 2nd - goldfish 3rd - dog 4th - cat 5th - hamsters, guinea pigs OTHERS - none. We found that no-one had birds, snakes, horses, gerbils, rats, or mice. The average number of cars, was 1.5. Most had one or two cars, but on
